title: Vods page not so useful
body: Just a suggestion for OCE Riot; on the vods page you should put a link (even a fail link or make all 5 games' buttons the same) for all 5 matches otherwise after game 1 the result is already known if a there are only links for the first 3 buttons. Kinda makes watching them pointless to some degree, both NA and EU LCS do this so you can always feel satisfied that you don't know the result until you see a team win 3 games even if they clean sweep. Thanks.

replies.body:
Ah, good point.

I'll let the team know who are in charge of that.

Thanks for the feedback :)
